name: section-iterator
description: Simple iterator for flat and multi section lists

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && babel src/sectionIterator.js --out-file dist/sectionIterator.js
scripts.ci-build: npm run lint && npm test && npm run dist
